articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Shafali Verma breaks record for fastest double century in women's Tests, becomes second Indian to breach 200-run mark - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Shafali Verma produced an incredible display of aggression in her double century against South Africa during the one-off Test. | Crickit
articles.content: India women's team's star opener, Shafali Verma, produced an incredible performance on Friday, as she became the fastest double centurion in the history of women's Test cricket. Shafali recorded the … [+2266 chars]
